code:
-spec make_the_integer_zero(Num1 :: integer(), Num2 :: integer()) -> integer().
make_the_integer_zero(Num1, Num2) ->
    if 
        Num2 rem 2 == 0 -> -1;
        true ->
            Num = abs(Num1),
            Total = lists:foldl(fun(I, Acc) -> Acc + trunc(math:pow(2, I)) end, 0, lists:seq(0, 60)),
            if 
                Num > Total -> -1;
                true -> calculate_operations(Num, Num2, 0, 60)
            end
    end.

calculate_operations(0, _, Ops, _) -> 
    Ops;
calculate_operations(_, _, Ops, -1) -> 
    Ops;
calculate_operations(Num, Num2, Ops, I) ->
    Value = trunc(math:pow(2, I)) + Num2,
    if 
        Num >= Value ->
            calculate_operations(Num - Value, Num2, Ops + 1, I);
        true ->
            calculate_operations(Num, Num2, Ops, I - 1)
    end.
